comment_this_file: this holds the information to create the database used by the bot
comment_this_file_2: any key that starts with "comment_" is ignored by the program

guilds.guild_id: BIGINT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL
guilds.comment_is_privileged: this is true for special servers, like any servers owned by me

channels.channel_id: BIGINT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL
channels.comment_ignore: this marks a channel that will not be tracked by snipe & will not respond to commands

messages.message_id: BIGINT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL
messages.comment_content: the content (aka text) of a message
messages.comment_attachments: this will be a list of attachments that will be serialized by the program
messages.comment_attachments_2: the attachments will be separated by a comma (,)
